message: This proposal divides the money equally. I propose we split it 600,000 for me and 400,000 for you.
You offered half, but I'll give you less. Now it's your turn to decide.
I propose an equal division, considering the inflation. Both of us would receive $500,000.
You want equal, but I'll give you a little less. Now it's your turn to decide.
Considering the inflation, I propose a division where I receive $400,000 and Bob receives $600,000.
